list.nz-button.icon-text-left: Button with icon and text on left
list.nz-button.icon-text-right: Button with icon and text on right
list.nzBlock: Button Property: option to fit button width to its parent width
list.nzGhost: Button Property: make background transparent and invert text and border colors
list.nzShape: Button Property: can be set to `circle` or omitted

list.nzAlign: Grid Property: the vertical alignment of the flex layout
list.nzJustify: Grid Property: horizontal arrangement of the flex layout
list.nzOffset: Grid Property: the number of cells to offset Col from the left
list.nzOrder: Grid Property: raster order, used in `flex` layout mode
list.nzPull: Grid Property: the number of cells that raster is moved to the left
list.nzPush: Grid Property: the number of cells that raster is moved to the right
list.nzResponsive: Grid Property: A full responsive attributes
list.nzSpan: Grid Property: raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to `display: none`
list.nzBreakpoint: Sider Property: breakpoints of the responsive layout
list.nzCollapsed: Sider Property: the collapsed status can be double binding
list.nzCollapsedWidth: Sider Property: width of the collapsed sidebar, by setting to 0 a special trigger will appear
list.nzCollapsible: Sider Property: whether can be collapsed
list.nzReverseArrow: Sider Property: reverse direction of arrow, for a sider that expands from the right
list.nzWidth: Sider Property: width of the sidebar

list.nzOffsetBottom: Affix Property: Pixels to offset from bottom when calculating position of scroll
list.nzOffsetTop: Affix Property: Pixels to offset from top when calculating position of scroll
list.nzClickHide: Dropdown Property: Whether hide menu when click
list.nzInlineCollapsed: Menu Property: specifies the collapsed status when menu is inline mode
list.nzInlineIndent: Menu Property: indent px of inline menu item on each level
list.nzMode: Menu Property: type of the menu
list.nzSelectable: Menu Property: allow selecting menu items
list.nzTheme: Menu Property: color theme of the menu
list.nzHideOnSinglePage: Pagination Property: Whether to hide pager on single page
list.nzStartIndex: Steps Property: To specify the starting number

list.nzDateRender: Date Property: custom rendering function for date cells (Not support by month-picker/year-picker)
list.nzDisabledDate: Date Property: specify the date that cannot be selected (Not support by year-picker)
list.nzRenderExtraFooter: Date Property: render extra footer in panel
list.nzShowTime: Date Property: to provide an additional time selection
list.nzShowToday: Date Property: whether to show 'Today' button
list.nz-form.explain-error: Form: A error message and only one
list.nz-form.explain: Form: Validation message and only one
list.nz-form.extra: Form: The extra prompt message. It is similar to help.
list.nz-form.item: Form: Used to separate the item in forms, contains label(optional) and control field.
list.nz-form.label-responsive: Form：The label of the form item.
list.nz-form.label: Form: The label of the form item, optional.
list.nzHasFeedback: From Property: Used with `nzValidateStatus`, this option specifies the validation status icon. Recommended to be used only with Input.
list.nzValidateStatus: From Property: Will generate status based on FormControl
list.nzAddonAfterIcon: Input Property: The label icon's ngClass displayed after
list.nzAddonBeforeIcon: Input Property: The label icon's ngClass displayed before
list.nzCompact: Input Property: Whether use compact style
list.nzPrefix: Input Property: The prefix icon for the Input
list.nzSuffix: Input Property: The suffix icon for the Input
list.nzFormatter: Input Number Property: Specifies the format of the value presented
list.nzParser: Input Number Property: Specifies the value extracted from nzFormatter
list.nzPrecision: Input Number Property: precision of input value
list.nzAllowHalf: Rate Property: whether to allow semi selection
list.nzDropdownClassName: Select Property: className of dropdown menu
list.nzDropdownMatchSelectWidth: Select Property: Whether dropdown's with is same with select
list.nzDropdownStyle: Select Property: style of dropdown menu
list.nzMaxMultipleCount: Select Property: Max selected option can be selected
list.nzMode: Select Property: Set mode of Select
list.nzNotFoundContent: Select Property: Specify content to show when no result matches
list.nzOnSearch: Select Property: Callback function that is fired when input changed
list.nzServerSearch: Select Property: nz-option will not be filtered when set to true
list.nzShowSearch: Select Property: Whether show search input in single mode
list.nzAutosize: Textarea Property: Only used for `textarea`, height autosize feature, can be set to boolean or an object `{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }`
list.nzHourStep: Time Property: interval between hours in picker
list.nzMinuteStep: Time Property: interval between minutes in picker
list.nzSecondStep: Time Property: interval between seconds in picker
list.nzBeforeUpload: Upload Property: Hook function which will be executed before uploading. Uploading will be stopped with false or a Observable. Warning：this function is not supported in `IE9`. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.
list.nzCustomRequest: Upload Property: override for the default xhr behavior allowing for additional customization and ability to implement your own XMLHttpRequest. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.
list.nzDirectory: Upload Property: Support upload whole directory
list.nzFileList: Upload Property: List of files, two-way data-binding
list.nzFileType: Upload Property: limit file type, e.g: `image/png,image/jpeg,image/gif,image/bmp`
list.nzFilterLimit: Upload Property: limit single upload count when `nzMultiple` has opened. `0` unlimited
list.nzFilterSize: Upload Property: limit file size (KB). `0` unlimited
list.nzMultiple: Upload Property: Whether to support selected multiple file. IE10+ supported. You can select multiple files with CTRL holding down while multiple is set to be true
list.nzShowUploadList: Upload Property: Whether to show default upload list, could be an object to specify `showPreviewIcon` and `showRemoveIcon` individually
list.nzWithCredentials: Upload Property: ajax upload with cookie sent

list.nzBadgeStatus: Badge Property: Set `nz-badge` as a status dot
list.nzOverflowCount: Badge Property: Max count to show
list.nzShowZero: Badge Property: Whether to show badge when `count` is zero
list.nzHoverable: Card Property: Lift up when hovering card
list.nzShowArrow: Collapse Property: Display arrow or not
list.nzGrid: List Property: The grid type of list. You can set grid to something like `{gutter: 16, column: 4}`
list.nzItemLayout: List Property: The layout of list, default is `horizontal`, If a vertical list is desired, set the itemLayout property to `vertical`
list.nzLoadMore: List Property: Shows a load more content
list.nzPagination: List Property: Shows a pagination content
list.nzExpand: Table Property: Current expand status, double binding
list.nzFilterMultiple: Table Property: Whether filter multiple mode
list.nzFrontPagination: Table Property: Whether paginate data in front side，should set to `false` if you want to paginate data in server side or display all data in table
list.nzLeft: Table Property: Left pixels, used to fixed column to left
list.nzNoResult: Table Property: Custom no result content
list.nzRight: Table Property: Right pixels, used to fixed column to right
list.nzShowExpand: Table Property: Whether show expand icon
list.nzShowPagination: Table Property: Whether show pagination component in bottom of the table
list.nzShowQuickJumper: Table Property: Determine whether you can jump to pages directly
list.nzShowSizeChanger: Table Property: Determine whether `nzPageSize` can be changed
list.nzSort: Table Property: define current sort order
list.nzWidth: Table Property: Specify the column width, can not used when grouping columns
list.nzAnimated: Tabs Property: Whether to change tabs with animation
list.nzTabsType: Tabs Property: Basic style of tabs
list.nzColor: Tag Property: Color of the Tag
list.nzMouseEnterDelay: Tooltip Property: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is shown on mouse enter
list.nzMouseLeaveDelay: Tooltip Property: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

list.nzAlertType: Alert Property: Type of Alert styles
list.nzBanner: Alert Property: Whether to show as banner
list.nzClosable: Alert Property: Whether Alert can be closed
list.nzShowIcon: Alert Property: Whether to show icon
list.nzCondition: Popconfirm Property: Whether to directly emit `onConfirm` without showing Popconfirm
list.nzProgressStatus: Progress Property: to set the status of the Progress
list.nzDelay: Spin Property: specifies a delay in milliseconds for loading state
list.nzSpinning: Spin Property: whether Spin is spinning
list.nzTip: Spin Property: customize description content when Spin has children

list.nzAutoFocus: General Property: get focus when component mounted
list.nzCancelText: General Property: Text of the Cancel button
list.nzChange: General Property: Callback for when component is changed
list.nzChecked: General Property: Checked status, double binding
list.nzClick: General Property: a click callback function
list.nzIndeterminate: General Property: set the status of indeterminate
list.nzLoading: General Property: set the loading status
list.nzOkText: General Property: Text of the OK button
list.nzOnClose: General Property: a close callback function
list.nzPlaceHolder: General Property: set the placeholder text
list.nzPopupStyle: General Property: to customize the style of the popup
list.nzSelectChange: General Property: a select callback function
list.nzTrigger: General Property: specify the customized trigger
list.nzVisible: General Property: Whether the component is visible or not.
